title: Sen. Bernie Sanders | Biden Responds to Putin's Latest Nuke Threat; Trump's Bizarre Nuke Rant: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Vladimir Putin once again threatening the world with nuclear weapons in Russia’s brutal war against Ukraine, which prompted Donald Trump to say something totally insane and incoherent.

Then, Senator Bernie Sanders talks about the limits of the Inflation Reduction Act, the stark contrast between rising consumer prices and rising corporate profits and student loan forgiveness.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
